0:
Own and publish your own crypto "Play to Earn" game. Making things easy - get your own fully developed game that is ready for publishing. A very nice and stable platform for you to later add more updates. Made in Unity with smart contracts that work on any ERC20 chain like Ethereum or Binance Smart chain. 
You can test the game out on my site. If you understand the perfect minimalistic approach that is widely used now in crypto games like Hamster Kombat and similar - you will understand the huge possibilities of this

The game is made where you can connect with your wallet - like Metamask or Trust wallet. No shady premmisions are asked - only basic connection. After that, you are able to earn coins inside the game which you can either redeem to your crypto wallet in real tokens or spend in-game to upgrade or expand. A lot more to be implemented - like mystery chests, bosses etc.

Visit my website - to play, test and make the order. Dont look for a P2E game this bullrun, simply OWN it!
